messages.message:
Are there any plans to allow extracted field results to be used in subsequent prompts? In this example, the prompt I use could be improved if I could use something like: 'Make a JSON of the flats/units contained within the ~valuation property~`{field: valuation property address}.` The JSON should include: Unit Name, Number of Bedrooms, Number of Kitchens, Number of Lounges.'

See my testing from a POV which does indeed fix the extraction in this case
there is a PFR that is being prioritized to allow what you are suggesting
I think this feature will be the answer to all my requests... thanks @Dale DeLoy
